item.description:
Join us for another fun evening, a Potluck dinner, Play a game of pool, sit by the fire, and enjoy each other's company!

We have the Great Room and the Movie Room from 7:00 till Midnight!

We will ask everyone to bring a dish


There will be no event fee for members who have paid their dues. Anyone who has not paid their dues can do so through paypal or by check to the organizer (email Ellen for specific information).

Non-members and those members who have not paid their dues will pay $12.00

Stay tuned for more information!

****We will invite Temple Emunah Jewish Singles Group to join us at our party!!! Please RSVP as soon as possible!!!!
item.name: Let's have Another Party!
